text: The women's freestyle 56 kilograms is a competition featured at the 2000 World Wrestling Championships, and was held at the Universiada Hall in Sofia, Bulgaria from 1 to 3 September 2000. ==Medalists== {|class="wikitable" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| |- |bgcolor="#cc9966"|Bronze|| |} ==Results== ===Preliminary round=== ====Pool 1==== ====Pool 2==== ====Pool 3==== ====Pool 4==== ===Knockout round=== ==References== Women's freestyle 56 kg
title: 2000 World Wrestling Championships – Women's freestyle 56 kg
